DOC.brief_title: Study Cerebrospinal Fluid Samples Diagnosing Carcinomatous Meningitis Patients With Cancer Meningeal Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Evaluate validity determine CA 15-3 level cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) use automate immuno-enzymatic method . Secondary - Determine sensitivity specificity assay assess CA 15-3 CSF . - Assess favorability intrathecal production CA 15-3 . - Determine threshold interpretation CA 15-3 level CSF . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Within 15 day suspect meningeal involvement , blood cerebrospinal fluid sample collect . Samples examine immunoenzyme assay . Patients suspected case carcinomatous meningitis undergo cerebrospinal MRI .
